name: A HAVEN OF PEACE, WHERE I AM ALIVE

metadata.name: A HAVEN OF PEACE, WHERE I AM ALIVE
metadata.description:
As I wake from my dream,
I find myself in a magical place,
Where the air is sweet and the sky is aglow
With the warm glow of the setting sun.

I am surrounded by a sea of lotus blooms,
Their delicate petals a soft pink hue,
And I am filled with a sense of peace
As I enjoy my own company.

I am lost in this dream-like world,
Where everything is perfect and serene,
And I find myself wishing,
That this could be real, and not just a dream.

But even as I wake and return to reality,
The memory of this magical place lingers on,
Leaving me with a sense of longing,
For the peace and beauty I have known.
